data.eml:eml: The Moroccan species of Chyromyidae (Diptera) with descriptions of five new species of Aphaniosoma Becker

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ebejer, Martin J. (2016): The Moroccan species of Chyromyidae (Diptera) with descriptions of five new species of Aphaniosoma Becker. Zootaxa 4208 (3): 221-236, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4208.3.2
